segments.source_content: ## ⚛️ React {#react}
**[React I Love You, But You're Bringing Me Down](https://marmelab.com/blog/2022/09/20/react-i-love-you.html)**

The author of React-Admin gives a fair criticism of React on many aspects (forms, useContextSelector, refs, deps array...). Don't miss [Dan Abramov's response](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1572590212647391235).

translations.zh-hant: React-Admin 作者針對 React 多個面向（表單、useContextSelector、refs、依賴陣列...）提出中肯批評。別錯過 [Dan Abramov 的回應](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1572590212647391235)。

segments.source_content: **[Next.js Layouts RFC in 5 minutes](https://vercel.com/blog/next-js-layouts-rfc-in-5-minutes)**

translations.zh-hant: **[5 分鐘了解 Next.js 佈局 RFC](https://vercel.com/blog/next-js-layouts-rfc-in-5-minutes)**

segments.source_content: The file-system based Next.js router will be significantly upgraded in the next major release. It includes support for nested layouts (like in Remix). This allows to avoid unnecessary unmount/remount of a layout during browsing, but also to manage data loading and errors. This article gives a quick overview. See also [Delba's thread](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1568291558776274945).

translations.zh-hant: Next.js 基於檔案系統的路由器將在下個主要版本大幅升級。新增支援嵌套佈局（類似 Remix），可避免瀏覽時不必要的佈局卸載/重載，同時管理資料載入與錯誤處理。本文提供快速概覽，另見 [Delba 的推文](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1568291558776274945)。

segments.source_content: **[React Router 6.4](https://remix.run/blog/react-router-v6.4)**
Big update: as expected, many Remix APIs (data-loading, mutation...) have finally been moved to React-Router. See the [2min video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX74DbFT5nI)

translations.zh-hant: 重大更新：如預期，許多 Remix API（資料載入、變更...）最終遷移至 React-Router。觀看 [2 分鐘影片](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX74DbFT5nI)

segments.source_content: **[What’s New In Gatsby 2022?](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2022/09/new-gatsby-2022/)**

Paul upgraded his blog to the latest Gatsby v4 version and shares with us how he used the latest features. Deferred Static Generation can significantly reduce build time. See also [Gatsby 5 Umbrella Discussion](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/36609) and the video [Gatsby v5 Alpha Showcase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C-WrnfUm33k): partial hydration is coming!

translations.zh-hant: Paul 將其部落格升級至最新 Gatsby v4 版本，並分享使用最新功能的經驗。延遲靜態生成能顯著減少建置時間。另見 [Gatsby 5 總體討論](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/36609) 與影片 [Gatsby v5 Alpha 展示](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C-WrnfUm33k)：局部 hydration 即將來臨！

## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
**[RFC: File System-Based Native Routing with Expo and React Native](https://blog.expo.dev/rfc-file-system-based-routing-in-react-native-7a35474722a)**

translations.zh-hant: **[RFC：基於檔案系統的原生路由（使用 Expo 和 React Native）](https://blog.expo.dev/rfc-file-system-based-routing-in-react-native-7a35474722a)**

segments.source_content: Evan Bacon is working on a new Expo router based on file-system conventions, similar to Next.js or Remix. He tells us all we need to know about this highly anticipated feature that brings the DX of the web to mobile. This should considerably reduce the boilerplate of our apps, but also improve discoverability, deep linking, indexing, loading data, error handling... See also this [thread](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1574837248029331495) and this [podcast](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/expo-router).

translations.zh-hant: Evan Bacon 正在開發基於檔案系統約定的全新 Expo 路由方案，類似 Next.js 或 Remix 的模式。他詳細介紹了這項備受期待的功能，該功能將網頁開發體驗引入行動端。這將大幅減少應用程式的樣板程式碼，同時提升可發現性、深度連結、索引建構、資料載入及錯誤處理能力⋯⋯另參閱此[討論串](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1574837248029331495)與此[播客](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/expo-router)。
